content:
1. Technology Development:
* Technical white paper outlining the technology stack and architecture used in the Fresh Earth ecosystem
* Software development plan including milestones, timelines, and resources required
* Patent and intellectual property documentation
* Security and data privacy plan
2. Marketing and Communications:
* Business plan outlining the market opportunity and revenue model
* Marketing strategy and budget
* Product positioning and branding guidelines
* Public relations and media outreach plan
3. Investment Documentation:
* Executive summary of the Fresh Earth ecosystem and investment opportunity
* Financial projections and revenue model
* Risk management and mitigation plan
* Legal and regulatory compliance documentation
* Pitch deck and investor presentations
* Cap table and ownership structure
* Term sheet and investment agreement.
